description: In a region on the brink of endless war, tradition chose the weapon you wield. Your sworn allegiance compels you to fight. Honor your father’s legacy. Become a true Champion of Canaan.

title: Virtual Insanity
description: A first person psychological horror game created for VR. Have you lost your mind? Or has the world around you gone mad?

title: Orwell: Keeping an Eye On You

details.Title: Orwell: Keeping an Eye On You

description: Big Brother has arrived - and it’s you. Investigate the lives of citizens to find those responsible for a series of terror attacks. Information from the internet, personal communications and private files are all accessible to you. But, be warned, the information you supply will have consequences.

title: Vision of Aurora Borealis
description: A scenic visual novel about a young photographer who comes across a mysterious girl who changes his outlook on life and aspirations.

title: A-Train PC Classic / みんなのA列車で行こうPC

details.Title: A-Train PC Classic / みんなのA列車で行こうPC

description: As president of a train company, lead city growth to make your transport business prosper. The retro style, square grid map, and complete tutorials are easy on the newcomer, but veterans will find a challenge with advanced resource management, research, and the passage of time.

title: Lord of Djinn
description: Lord of Djinn is a two player shoot-em-up. Each player aims to destroy the lesser djinn of the opposite color faster than their opponent can slay their own to gain influence in the match. Collect coins dropped by slain enemies to increase the power of your djinn.

title: RPG World - Action RPG Maker
description: RPG World – THE Action RPG Maker! Unleash your imagination with RPG World and create, share and play amazing 3D games with our growing community. Claim glory and treasure as you conquer magical worlds, alone or as a team. No coding required!

title: 3D Pool
description: 3D Pool brings the Pool table right to your home!

title: Planet Driller
description: Planet Driller is a mining game where you need to find DarkMatter in order to save the earth. To do this, drill your way through a procedurally generated planet full of minerals that you can sell for cash, then use the cash to upgrade your ship and make the job a lot easier!

title: CapRiders: Euro Soccer
description: CapRiders: Euro Soccer is an arcade online and local multiplayer soccer game. Play with up to 8 gamepads or use your Android or iOS phone as a controller. Challenge your friends on many unique stadiums and choose among 12 european teams, each featuring caricatures of famous players.

title: Bohemian Killing
description: Paris, 1894. Class differences and pervasive racism finally lead to a tragedy. A year later you find yourself on trial, accused of a brutal murder. How far will you go to exonerate yourself? Will you lie? Manipulate the evidence? Frame others? Act insane? Confess? Your imagination is the limit.

title: Space Hulk: Tactics
description: Space Hulk: Tactics is a faithful adaptation of the board game Space Hulk, set in the Warhammer 40,000 universe, bringing a unique twist to the cult classic formula. Engage in bloody battles as either a squad of Terminator Space Marines or the deadly alien Genestealers.

title: The Cat! Porfirio's Adventure
description: The best sim game about adventures of an urban cat in the village.

title: The Agency: Chapter 1
description: “The Agency” is an episodic mystery kinetic novel. In a fictional dystopic sci-fi steampunk world still recovering from the destruction of a recent global war; a young man travels to the Imperial capital city to seek better fortunes for himself.

title: Has-Been Heroes
description: Has-Been Heroes is a challenging, lane-based roguelike game of strategy and action, featuring a band of heroes on a quest to escort the King's twin princesses to school!

title: Pixel Cup Soccer 17
description: Pixel Cup Soccer 17 is an arcade retro style soccer game. A dynamic arcade game with fast paced gameplay and engaging mechanics. Just the fun part of soccer!

title: Thunder Gun: Revenge of the Mutants

details.Title: Thunder Gun: Revenge of the Mutants

description: You have a gun that shoots lightning, goddamnit; with it, you will defend Earth against formidable mutant enemies until rainstorms render it inoperable, forcing you to use conventional weapons until the skies clear.

title: Vanilla Bagel: The Roguelike
description: Vanilla Bagel: The Roguelike is a mostly classic RPG/Roguelike with a vast game world. The game has dozens of dungeons and items, and hundreds of unique enemies. There is a great variety in magic, curses and item enchantments.

title: Zero-G VR
description: Experience the zero-gravity spacewalk flight, feel the edge of the universe and its black holes, immerse yourself in an asteroid cloud escape to the space shuttle. Please don't forget your space suit!

title: Notruf 112 | Emergency Call 112
description: Emergency Call 112 – The Fire Fighting Simulation is an exciting, fully detailed simulation of the eventful life of a big city fire department. It was developed in cooperation with and modelled on the fire brigade of Mülheim, Germany. Mülheim has one of the largest and most modern fire stations in Europe.

title: Momonga Pinball Adventures
description: Momonga is a unique pinball game, where you bounce a flying squirrel through different levels. Enemies, boss fights, exploration - it has all the ingredients of good old action-adventure games, but with flippers!

title: Mahjong Destiny
description: Mahjong Destiny is a challenging mahjong game telling the story of a young maiden on her quest to meet up with her loved one. Join her as she embarks on her adventure solving classic Chinese mahjong puzzles.

title: Megapolis
description: Construct beautiful and functional city zones with plenty of modern blocks and keep your residents happy by providing all services they need, and they will reward you with a tidy profit. You can work your way to the top in the comprehensive campaign mode or you can create and play your own custom scenarios.

title: Beeftacular
description: Beeftacular is a fast-paced platformer where you have to clean levels from rotten meat chunks as fast as possible. Jump your way through the level and use your attacks to hack all of them into pieces. Compare your speedruns with your friends and the world.

title: Reset 1-1
description: The world has ended, Demons have risen to conquer the uninhabited and flourishing nature outside.  It's your turn, with your unknown identity, to find your path for a new beginning.  Let's not beat about the bush here. Reset 1-1 is everything you loved about the late 80's/early 90's. It's a blast from the past, with a fresh spin.

title: Assault on the Necrospire
description: Assault on the Necrospire is a roguelike with an emphasis on interesting loot and character building. Your mission is to destroy the Necromancer. Wipe the dust off your spellbook; you're going to need it.

title: Stratego - Single Player
description: Play Jumbo's original classic strategy board game

title: Gotta Go
description: With pressure mounting, the clock ticking, and only a vague idea where the bathroom is, players must avoid co-workers’ inane blathering and HR’s unwavering gaze as they make their way across the office to find their porcelain sanctuary.

title: Gun Range VR
description: Gun Range VR offers you a sandbox style gun range for HTC Vive which includes interactive items, achievements, unlocks, frequent updated items. If that is not enough you can also enjoy the 16 different mini games Gun Range VR offers, all with their own online Leader Boards to compete for the top slots.

title: Nary
description: Nary is a hardcore pseudo-endless runner about multitasking. If you want to survive, you'll have to both avoid the randomly generated obstacles and defeat your foes by mashing correct button sequences!

title: Deformers
description: Prepare for an epic battle! Deformers is a physics-based arena brawler where the goal is to out-battle, out-eat, and out-score your opponent. Smash up your friends in splitscreen co-op, or team up and fight against others online!

title: Project Syria
description: Nearly one half of Syria’s 23 million people have been displaced in its civil war and no group has been as severely affected as children. Children make up more than half of the three million refugees living in camps some news reports indicate that children are actually being specifically targeted in the violence.

title: Across The Line
description: Across the Line is an immersive virtual reality experience that combines 360°video and computer generated imaging (CGI) to put viewers in the shoes of a patient entering a health center for a safe and legal abortion.

title: Glow
description: A fast-paced 3rd person shooter. Control a brave Firefly and kill as many enemy bugs as possible. Unlock perks for more weapons & passive abilities to gain more score and become Glow world champion!

title: League of Evil
description: League of Evil is an action game where you, as a bionic super agent take on the mission to defeat the League of Evil. Use your acrobatic skills to punch your way through levels filled with deadly traps and defeat your enemies. The world is counting on you!

title: Shout Of Survival
description: A multi-player SHOUTING (not Shooting) game where 2 monsters hunt down 2 humans that are trying to reunite.

title: Ant Queen
description: Begin a journey like no other, become the Ant Queen and establish your empire. Ant Queen is a simulation game where you breed different types of ants to ultimately conquer your surroundings and achieve a stable ant colony.

title: Human, we have a problem
description: Collect rocks and defend a tiny planet populated by weird spatial sheep.

title: Duckie Dash
description: Duckie Dash is a casual racing game that can be played solo or with up to 4 players split-screen. Race rubber duckies across 30 different levels with features like jet streams, geysers, and more! Easy enough for small children to play, but timed challenges make it fun for adults too! The whole family will enjoy Duckie Dash!

title: Red Trigger
description: Red Trigger is a First Person Shooter (FPS) Puzzle game. Can you infiltrate and corrupt the system?

title: GemBreak
description: GemBreak is an action-packed physics puzzle game on steroids, with great speed and action/tactical -oriented gameplay.

title: Discrepant
description: Discrepant is a psychological adventure game set in a dystopic sci-fi world that is slowly unwinding. It's dark, deadly, and unsettling. It explores the meaning of existence and purpose, challenges reality and emotional connection through a complex plot, and comes with a twist around every corner.

title: LUMBERMANCER
description: You're a Lumbermancer! Use your dark lumber magic to summon logs to do your bidding. Control both the Lumbermancer and the logs simultaneously to fight the creatures of the woods and steal their mysterious lunches!SUMMON LOGS! FIGHT THE DEVIL! EAT A SANDWICH!U

title: Mr. Pumpkin Adventure
description: Mr. Pumpkin's Adventure is a point-and-click puzzle game. The main character of this game is Mr. Pumpkin who lost his memories. During the adventure, you will help him solve all the puzzles, which will eventually unveil an evil plot.

title: Carpe Lucem - Seize The Light VR

details.Title: Carpe Lucem - Seize The Light VR

description: Carpe Lucem challenges and entertains players by transferring classical 2D puzzles into the virtual space. It creates a whole new way of interacting and playing mind teasing puzzle games and it made nobody sick in hundreds of demos at trade shows. VR equipment such as HTC Vive or Oculus required.

title: Lil Big Invasion
description: Solve tricky dungeons and rescue helpless little fireflies in this giant 2D action-adventure! Find those little brats, keep them together and lure them with your light to the exit in order to bring them back home! Win epic boss fights and challenge the clock for a high score.

title: Take Thy Throne
description: Take Thy Throne's main gamemode consists of taking down towers and barricades to make your way towards the enemy team's King.

title: Drift Horizon Online
description: Drift Horizon Online - Drifting simulation game! - Nice & optimized graphics! - Realistic car sounds (Blow off, Exhaust, Backfires, Skids, etc)! - Realistic physics!

title: 12 Labours of Hercules V: Kids of Hellas (Platinum Edition)

details.Title: 12 Labours of Hercules V: Kids of Hellas (Platinum Edition)

description: With your help, Hercules must return the kids home, blow up the factory that produces the evil toys, and lead a strategic operation to destroy Ares' command transmitter in 12 Labours of Hercules V: Kids of Hellas!

title: Way of the Red
description: Way of the Red is a 2d action platformer with a focus on fun combat, satisfying kills, and fluid movement. Use versatile sword techniques to shred enemies to pieces, while searching for your lost love from years past.

title: Den vänstra handens stig
description: Den vänstra handens stig is a transcendental blackened narrative experience that focuses on courage, determination and sacrifice.

title: SteamVR Driver for Razer™ Hydra
description: This driver adds support for the Razer Hydra motion controller in SteamVR. If you own an Oculus Rift and a Razer Hydra – you can now play virtually any VIVE VR title on SteamVR!

title: Alchemist Penguin
description: Take control of the Alchemist Penguin in the relentless battle against his dinosaur aggressors! Face off against a never-ending army of dinosaurs under increasing difficulty--and utilize a huge variety of weapons, potions, and techniques to aid you in your fight.

title: the 9th day:第九日
description: The story of The 9th Day, that started with the autumn fire incident, begins here…

title: Grim Dragons
description: BE THE DRAGON! Slay peasants, eat livestock and burn villages! It's time to teach those pesky humans who's at the top of the food chain!

title: PRINCIPIA: Master of Science
description: Principia: Master of Science is a simulation game with the theme of European science in 17th century. Choose one of 12 real scientists from the era of Isaac Newton and proceed with your research. It is a time when even the term "Science" did not exist. Who can be the master of science?

title: Man vs Snake: The Long and Twisted Tale of Nibbler

details.Title: Man vs Snake: The Long and Twisted Tale of Nibbler

description: In 1984, on a single quarter (and over 44 hours of non-stop play), Tim McVey became the first person in history to score over one billion points on a video game. 25 years later, rumors of a higher score surface online, attributed to Italian kickboxing champion Enrico Zanetti.

title: Man vs Snake: The Long and Twisted Tale of Nibbler

title: The Barbarian and the Subterranean Caves

details.Title: The Barbarian and the Subterranean Caves

description: The Barbarian and the Subterranean Caves is an adventure visual novel about the heroic feats of the intrepid warrior Ragnar. Now you can become the famed adventurer Ragnar and bravely seek out all-new original adventures in this exciting game. Delve into the mysteries of the caves and discover what lies in waiting below.

title: Raiders! : The Story of the Greatest Fan Film Ever Made

details.Title: Raiders! : The Story of the Greatest Fan Film Ever Made

description: After seeing ‘Raiders of the Lost Ark’ almost 35 years ago, three 11-year-old boys from Mississippi spent 7 years on a faithful, shot-for-shot adaptation of the classic action adventure film. They finished every scene, except one; the film's explosive airplane set piece.

title: Raiders! : The Story of the Greatest Fan Film Ever Made

details.Title: Raiders! : The Story of the Greatest Fan Film Ever Made

description: After seeing ‘Raiders of the Lost Ark’ almost 35 years ago, three 11-year-old boys from Mississippi spent 7 years on a faithful, shot-for-shot adaptation of the classic action adventure film. They finished every scene, except one; the film's explosive airplane set piece.
